entry.title: Learning to Draw Digitally for Beginners

media:group.media:title: Learning to Draw Digitally for Beginners
media:group.media:description:
My Digital Art for Beginners Course: http://bradsartschool.com The hardware and software video: https://youtu.be/67N24t9w66o Here are the free files used in this video https://bradcolbow.gumroad.com/l/nlmqni
Getting started in digital art can be intimidating. In this video I go through an exercise where we talk about layers and brushes and what you should learn first when learning to draw digitally.

entry.title: What Happened to Brad's Art School? - A Channel Update

media:group.media:title: What Happened to Brad's Art School? - A Channel Update
media:group.media:description: My Digital Art for Beginners Course: http://bradsartschool.com My Main Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/thebradcolbow Twitter: https://twitter.com/bradcolbow Insta: https://www.instagram.com/bcolbow/

entry.title: How to Draw and Shade with Pencils

media:group.media:title: How to Draw and Shade with Pencils
media:group.media:description:
Get the resources: http://bradsartschool.com
Shading with pencils is a lot of fun and once you get the hang of it isn't as hard as it looks. In this video we talk about drawing with a pencil, different types and lead hardness and how to get a nice pencil gradient when shading.
What I used in this video (these are Amazon affiliate links) Sketchbook: https://amzn.to/3FaAe4S Mechanical pencil: https://amzn.to/3oxzIId Pencil leads (b, hb, h): https://amzn.to/3Bdwc9s 4b leads: https://amzn.to/3FkXBss 4h leads: https://amzn.to/3iyKHNN Pencil sharpener: https://amzn.to/3AcCSmS Gum (Kneaded) eraser: https://amzn.to/3Bav72o Eraser: https://amzn.to/3izQoLo

media:group.media:title: Color Theory - A Beginners Guide
media:group.media:description:
My Digital Art for Beginners Course: http://bradsartschool.com
You've drawn some pretty pictures but now it's time to add colors. Here are some tips and tricks (and the principles behind them) that will help you get started. If you're a beginner artist or illustrators this takes you through the steps of coloring your art. If you are looking to color comics or paint a landscape color is an important tool.
get the art files over at http://bradsartschool.com
Discounts to my courses: https://brad.site/learn

media:group.media:title: Drawing Objects in Perspective
media:group.media:description:
My Digital Art for Beginners Course: http://bradsartschool.com
Drawing in perspective can get tricky as objects get more complicated. How do you draw circles in perspective? How do you draw angled lines in perspective? How to you draw cars in perspective? Buildings? furniture? Rooms? Giraffes? In this lesson we break down how to use basic shapes to construct more complex illustrations.
http://www.bradsartschool.com for the grids used in this lesson
Follow me around the internet: Twitter: https://twitter.com/bradcolbow Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bcolbow/ Drawing Tech Top 10 lists: http://brad.site/ My Drawing and video gear: http://brad.site/mygear/

entry.title: From Sketch to Finished Art: Zelda Korok #shorts

media:group.media:title: From Sketch to Finished Art: Zelda Korok #shorts
media:group.media:description: I love the little Koroks from Zelda Breath of the Wild. Here is an art tutorial of how I went about drawing one of them in Procreate. #shorts #procreate

media:group.media:title: Learn to Draw in 30 days #shorts
media:group.media:description: It takes a long time to really good good at art and drawing but there are steps you can take now to start that journey. #shorts

media:group.media:title: Drawing Heads at Different Angles (#shorts)
media:group.media:description: To see the full video HEAD over here: https://youtu.be/pW9YCEZ5UjA This video is the Loomis head drawing method in under a minute (it was hard to fit in under a minute) #shorts

media:group.media:title: How to Animate in Procreate #shorts
media:group.media:description: Procreate has some pretty great simple animation features. They are easy to use and you can export your artwork to share on instagram or other apps. #shorts #procreate #animation

media:group.media:title: Perspective Drawing for Beginners
media:group.media:description:
My Digital Art for Beginners Course: http://bradsartschool.com
Check out my Courses: http://brad.site/learn/ Drawing in perspective is pretty easy to pick up and an essential skill that we will be building on in future lessons. It helps with drawing backgrounds. it helps with drawing characters and objects in a scene. Today we're going to make it easy with some lessons and tutorials.

entry.title: Going from Sketch to Finished Vector Art (#shorts)

media:group.media:title: Going from Sketch to Finished Vector Art (#shorts)
media:group.media:description: This is the super short sped up version of how I take a sketch and take it to a finished vector drawing in Affinity Designer in under a minute (the video is under a minute, it took me longer to do the drawing.) #shorts #drawing #affinitydesigner

media:group.media:title: Getting Started in Animation #shorts
media:group.media:description: What software do I use to animate? I use Adobe Animate, but there are a lot of options out there for the iPad, android phones and the PC and Mac. This is a quick overview of where to start. #shorts

entry.title: Weirdest iPad Stylus I've Ever Used (#shorts)

media:group.media:title: Weirdest iPad Stylus I've Ever Used (#shorts)
media:group.media:description: The Sonar pen is just weird. It emulated presser sensitivity by you plugging it into the headphone jack. #shorts
